name: Strawberry Rush
description:
Strawberry Rush Game for N3rdGa5m

This is my first game. I learned from Coding in Flow. Thank you so much Coding. You have sparked a new game dev and I am pushing forward to make more. Please check his youtube. 

This game is a simple 2D 2 level game at this time. More levels and macanics are planned. 

Plot!

You are a cute little girl in a cow onesie that loves strawberries. But the frog king has taken all the STRAWBERRIES!!! Are Moo girl has got to get her strawberry fix. Help her collect as many strawberries that you can and stop the big bad frog king from hoarding all the strawberries.
